subject: Re: The first run of 25 as a system.
author: bhali333
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
>
> 
>  Stereo echo box speakers, and twin mic pick ups. I don't know if I 
like it. I think the echo box needs some work. I can't record record 
with my old tape deck, I have to use the boom box with stereo line 
inputs, or make an adapter cord for the old decks. This was AM linear 
mode.
>  
>  Frank-S
> _________________________________________________________________
> Climb to the top of the charts! Play Star Shuffle: the word 
scramble challenge with star power.
> http://club.live.com/star_shuffle.aspx?
icid=starshuffle_wlmailtextlink_oct
>


Frank,
system 25 sounds great, what I love about it is the lack of background
noise in the files. what volume is it set on? the voices sound a bit 
low.

bruce
